name: Polaroid Panic!
description:
WEEK 3 PROMPT:  "A GAME THAT CAN BE PLAYED OVER ZOOM WITH REMOTE CONTROL"

FOCUS:  Encourage a frantic collaborative effort

Polaroid Panic! is a hectic action-puzzle game meant to be played with friends over Zoom. You and your friends attempt to rearrange a room before time runs out by occasionally looking at a polaroid of the room's initial setup for guidance. This was a really, really fun prototype to make, and my focus this week was to make an experience that was hectic and collaborative. By collaborative, what I mean is that any number of people can "play" - join in the communication of "rotate the clock more!" - and the more people who actually play - utilize Zoom's remote control - the more hectic and fun the game is for everyone!
